snippet: There were many causes of death for the Early Bird, among them Internet services that made the effort seem like an anachronism.
abstract: Defense Department’s Early Bird news service, which drove debates at the Pentagon with its compilation of articles on military operations, budget politics and weapons programs, is declared dead; centralized Pentagon-financed effort was seen as an anachronism, especially one that was delivered only once a day, in era of 24-hour news and personalized news aggregation services.
lead_paragraph: There were many causes of death for the Early Bird, among them Internet services that made the effort seem like an anachronism.

headline.main: Pentagon News Service, Read at First Light and Debated All Day, Fades Away
headline.print_headline: Pentagon News Service, Read at First Light and Debated All Day, Fades Away
